node.title: 30th USDA Interagency Research Forum on Invasive Species
node.summary: With my student Shiwnai Sapkota, we attended the exciting Forum on Invasive Species in Annapolis, MD.

node.title: Aerial detection of invasive callery pear
node.summary: In this endeavor, researchers from SE U.S. will collaborate on aerial detection of invasive Callery pear.
